definitions.body: old, of human beings, as adj. pred. Ge 18:11 (J), Job 32:4 ([[מִמֶּנּוּ לְיׇמִים]] ´[[ז]], in compar.), or attrib. [[אָב זׇקֵן]] Ge 44:20 (J), ´[[אִישׁ ז]] Ju Jdg 19:16, Jdg 19:17, Jdg 19:20, Jdg 19:22, ´[[נׇבִיא ז]] 1Ki 13:11, 1Ki 13:25, 1Ki 13:29, ´[[מֶלֶךְ ז]] Ec 4:13; prob. also [[וּשְׂבַע ימים]] ´[[ז]] Ge 35:29 (P), Job 42:17 and Ge 25:8 (P) acc. to LXX Sam Di; cf. also Ezr 3:12.

definitions.title: a.
definitions.body: old man Ge 43:27 (J), Le 19:32 (H), De 28:50, De 32:7 (‖[[אָב]]), 1Sa 2:31, 1Sa 2:32, 1Sa 28:14, Is 47:6, Job 12:20, Job 32:9, Pr 17:6, Pr 20:29, Ps 119:100, Joe 1:2; old men and old women Zec 8:4, Zec 8:4; cf. [[זְקַן בֵּיתוֹ]] Ge 24:2 (J), [[זִקְנֵי בֵיתוֹ]] 2Sa 12:17; esp. opp. [[נַעַר]] Ex 10:9 (E), Is 3:5, Is 20:4, Je 51:22, La 2:21, Ps 148:12, and in phr. [[מִנַּעַר וְעַד זׇקֵן]] Ge 19:4 (J), Jos 6:21 (JE), Es 3:13; opp. [[ילדים]] 1Ki 12:6, 1Ki 12:8, 1Ki 12:13 = 2Ch 10:6, 2Ch 10:8, 2Ch 10:13; opp. [[בַּחוּרִים]] Je 31:13, Ez Eze 9:6, Joe 3:1, cf. 2Ch 36:17 (+ [[יׇשֵׁשׁ]]) and Je 6:11 (+ [[מְלֵא ימים]]); opp. [[עוּל]] [[ימים]] Is 65:20; opp. [[יונקי שׁדים]] and [[עוללים]] Joe 2:16.

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: usu. pl. elders, as having authority, term techn. (100 t. +); elders of a people, esp. Israel Ex 3:16, Ex 3:18, Ex 12:21 (all J), Ex 17:5, Ex 17:6, Ex 18:12, Ex 19:7, Ex 24:1, Ex 24:9, Ex 24:14, Jos 24:1 (all E), Nu 11:16, Nu 11:16 ([[שׁׂטְרָיו]]), v:Nu 11:24, v:Nu 11:25, v:Nu 11:30, Nu 16:25, Jos 7:6, Jos 8:10, Jos 9:11 (all JE), De 5:20 (‖[[רָאשֵׁי שִׁבְטֵיכֶם]]), De 27:1, De 29:9 (‖[[ראשׁי שׁבטיכם]], [[שׁׂטְרֵיכֶם]]), De 31:9, De 31:28, Jos 8:33 (‖[[שׁׂטְרִים]] [[וְשׁׂפְטָיו]]), Jos 23:2 (‖[[רָאשׁיו]], [[שׁׂפְטָיו]], [[שׁׂטְרָיו]]); cf. also prob. Jos 24:31 = Ju Jdg 2:7 (all D); Le 9:1, cf. [[זִקְנֵי הָעֵדָה]] Le 4:15 († both P), Ju Jdg 21:16; see also 1Sa 4:3, 1Sa 8:4, 1Sa 15:30, 2Sa 3:17, 2Sa 5:3 = 1Ch 11:3, 2Sa 17:4, 2Sa 17:15, 1Ki 8:1, 1Ki 8:3 = 2Ch 5:2, 2Ch 5:4, also 1Ch 15:25, 1Ch 21:16; cf. Is 3:2 ([[גִּבּוֹר וְאִישׁ מִלְחָמָָה]] ´[[שׁוֹפֵט וְנׇבִיא וְקׂסֵם וְז]]), Is 9:14 (‖[[נְשׂוּא־פָנִים]], but v. prob. gloss, cf. Ew Che Di Du al.); elders of one tribe (Judah) 1Sa 30:26, 2Sa 19:12, so of Gilead Ju Jdg 11:5, Jdg 11:7, Jdg 11:8, Jdg 11:9, Jdg 11:10, Jdg 11:11; after the division of the kingdoms, of N. Isr. [[זקני הארץ]] 1Ki 20:7 cf. v:1Ki 20:8, also 2Ki 6:32, 2Ki 6:32, 2Ki 10:1 (‖[[שָׂרִים]] etc.) cf. v:2Ki 10:5; under Josiah [[זקני יְהוּדָה]] 2Ki 23:1 = 2Ch 34:29; see also [[הארץ]] ´[[ז]] Je 26:17, cf. [[זקני ארץ]] Pr 31:23, cf. La 1:19, La 2:10, La 4:16, La 5:12, La 5:14 (‖[[שׂרים]]; + [[שַׁעַר]]); oft. in Ezek.: Ez Eze 7:26 (‖[[כהן]]), of Judah Eze 8:1, of Isr. Eze 8:11, Eze 8:12, Eze 14:1, Eze 20:1, Eze 20:3, also Eze 9:6 (but del. Co). Exil. [[הַגּוֹלָה]] ´[[ז]] Je 29:1 (‖[[הכהנים]], [[הנביאים]]); post-exil. Ezr 10:8 (‖[[שׂרים]]), poss. also Joe 1:14; elders of ´[[י]] Is 24:23 (cf. Ex 24:1, Ex 24:9), [[זִקְנֵי הַכּׂהֲנִים]] 2Ki 19:2 = Is 37:2, so Je 19:1 (‖[[זקני העם]]); of other peoples, Midian Nu 22:4, Nu 22:7, Moab v:Nu 22:7 (all E), Egypt Ps 105:22 (‖[[שׂרים]]); of Gebal Ez 27:9; elders of a city, esp. as sitting in the gate to judge De 19:12, De 21:2 (+ [[שׁׂפְטֶיךָ]]) v:De 21:3, v:De 21:4, v:De 21:6, v:De 21:19 (+ [[שַׁעַר־מְקׂמוֹ]]), v:De 21:20, De 22:15 (+ [[הַשָָּׁעְרָה]]), v:De 22:16, v:De 22:17, v:De 22:18, De 25:7 (+ [[הַשַּׁ֫עֲרָה]]), v:De 25:8, v:De 25:9 (all in Dt. code, and only so therein), Ru 4:2, Ru 4:4, Ru 4:9, Ru 4:11 (cf. [[שַׁעַר]] v:Ru 4:1, v:Ru 4:11), [[מוֹשַׁב זְקֵנִים]] Ps 107:32 (‖[[קְהַל־עָָם]]); Ju Jdg 8:14 (‖[[שׂרים]]), v:Jdg 8:16, 1Sa 11:3, 1Sa 16:4, 1Ki 21:8, 1Ki 21:11, Ezr 10:14.
